comments.body:
@yongtang aren't we looking at TensorFlow 2.5 release for the filesystem migration?
cc: @mihaimaruseac

@kvignesh1420 If the PR can be merged before upcoming 2.5, then hdfs will be deprecated in 2.5 (with the option of using `TF_ENABLE_LEGACY_FILESYSTEM=1` to keep in legacy mode), in 2.6 or higher we can consider completely remove hdfs.
Can we have this env var documented somewhere?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +644,648 @@      }
      LOG(WARNING) << "Legacy file system for '" << scheme << "' is deprecated"
                   << " and will be removed in tensorflow 2.6 or higher."
                   << " Please switch to tensorflow-io"
                   << " (https://github.com/tensorflow/io) for file system"
